cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to a string instead of an integer will cause configuration parsing errors and prevent the CU from starting properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting Asn1_verbosity to an invalid enum value will cause configuration validation failure and ASN.1 decoding issues.
du.explanation_zh: 將 Asn1_verbosity 設定為無效的枚舉值會導致配置驗證失敗，並造成 ASN.1 解碼問題。
